name: Levitate UI kit for 3D presentations
description:
Use Levitate to create cool scenes and get more attention to your project. Design eye-catching presentations or enhance a website, application, print materials or even your brand!


Visit website / Full version / Video showcase


Highlights


  • 550+ components to enhance a brand, website, presentation, interface, etc
  • 50+ ready-to-use templates for desktop, mobile and some pitch slides
  • Variety of 3D items: gadgets, geometric items, icons, mockups, etc
  • Each object is masked, so you can swap colors right in Figma!
